title: NHL Revealed: A Season Like No Other
overview: NHL Revealed is a series that will tell the stories of more than two dozen of the League's top stars – on and off the ice – as they participate in 2013-14 regular-season games, including the four 2014 Coors Light NHL Stadium Series™ games and the Tim Hortons NHL Heritage Classic™. Additionally, the cameras will follow the stars to Sochi and back in February.
